items.name: Foundation Pass
items.description: Parse & Organize - Core structure and correctness. Includes: logical flow, section hierarchy, proper pagination, margins, center-fold safety, print-safe export.

items.name: Layout Pass
items.description: Structured Layout - Clean booklet layout with final page sizing, refined margins, gutter spacing, and visual breathing room. This is typesetting, not design.

items.name: Typography Pass
items.description: Readability & Refinement - Print-safe font selection, header/body pairing, line spacing, rhythm, and hierarchy optimization for reading comfort.
